render.util module

This module provides helper functions for general plotting. Matplotlib is used for the plotting backend. | Author: Alec Glisman (GitHub: @alec-glisman) | Date: 2023-11-29

Functions

Set the style of the plots.

Save a figure to the output directory.

close_fig(fig: plt.figure) -> None:

Close the figure and clear the memory.

Raises

FileNotFoundError

If the output directory does not exist.
